thread.title: & Calvin Harris Breakup Rumors Are 'Stupid,' Says Selena Gomez
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift & Calvin Harris Breakup Rumors Are 'Stupid,' Says Selena Gomez - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: & Calvin Harris Breakup Rumors Are 'Stupid,' Says Selena Gomez
text: Selena Gomez made an appearance on SiriusXM’s Andy Cohen Live on Monday (October 12) where she was asked about the Taylor Swift and Calvin Harris breakup rumors. Andy Cohen asked the 23-year-old entertainer if they had broken up, to which she replied, “I think I would have found that out. Is that a rumor?” “Honestly, [...] »
